title: Home on Stoney Creek
description: "Kentucky! Why, God, do we have to move to Kentucky?"The cry for freedom is spreading throughout the colonies calling many people to war, but not Sarah's family. The cry they hear leads them to a new, untamed wilderness called Kentucky. Kentucky doesn't feel much like freedom to Sarah, however. She can't understand why God didn't answer her prayers to stay in Virginia, but she vows she'll return some day.
author: Wanda Luttrell
